p: Because SARS-CoV may be be transmitted by aerosol (i.e. aerosolized droplets from coughing), and due to its physical stability in the environment, the low or absent protective immunity in the human population, and the lack of effective antivirals or vaccines, infection control against SARS relied primarily on the prevention of person-to-person transmission (see for review Cheng etÂ al. 2007).
